about: We are a community-focused church dedicated to serving our members and our neighbors.

ministries.description: A fun and safe environment for kids to learn about God's love.

ministries.name: Youth Ministry
ministries.description: Helping teens grow in faith and connect with peers.

ministries.description: Leading the congregation in worship through music.

missionStatement: Transforming lives through faith, hope, and love.
history: Founded in 1985, Grace Community Church has been a place of worship, community, and service for over three decades.

beliefs.title: The Bible
beliefs.description: We believe the Bible is the inspired Word of God, providing guidance and truth for our lives.

beliefs.title: Salvation
beliefs.description: We believe salvation is a gift from God, available to all who accept Jesus Christ as their Savior.

beliefs.title: Community
beliefs.description: We believe in building a strong community through love, service, and fellowship.
